fields.Title of Presentation: "Creating Resources to Improve Digital Learning Object Development and Management"
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Association of College & Research Libraries Distance & Online Learning Section
fields.Description/Abstract: <span>This poster will describe how to develop support materials and a management system for digital learning objects. Many libraries create content as needed, but don’t have an overarching plan, which can lead to disorganization. Starting from scratch can be intimidating, but this poster will provide guidance and adaptable resources.</span>
